title: Runner

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Run around the Town during the day. (1 use)

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- When you run around the Town, you will learn the name and roles of three people. You will not learn who is which role.
- Your run will always include at least one Town role and one role that cannot win with the Town. Any players that are you informed about that cannot win with the Town will be informed that they noticed a Runner running around the Town and any Town roles that they discovered during their run.

desc:
Post 194
*Running out of patience for your nonsense.*
